hero.name: Alex Johnson
hero.title: Computer Science Student
hero.subtitle: Full-Stack Developer & Problem Solver
hero.description: Passionate about creating innovative solutions and learning cutting-edge technologies. Currently pursuing my Bachelor's in Computer Science with a focus on web development and software engineering.

about.title: About Me
about.description: I'm a dedicated Computer Science student with a passion for technology and innovation. My journey in programming started in high school, and since then, I've been constantly learning and building projects that solve real-world problems.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science

projects.title: E-Commerce Platform
projects.description: A full-stack e-commerce platform built with React, Node.js, and PostgreSQL. Features include user authentication, product catalog, shopping cart, and payment integration.

projects.title: Task Management App
projects.description: A collaborative task management application with real-time updates, drag-and-drop functionality, and team collaboration features.

projects.title: Weather Dashboard
projects.description: A responsive weather dashboard that displays current weather and forecasts for multiple cities with beautiful visualizations.

projects.title: Machine Learning Classifier
projects.description: A machine learning project that classifies images using TensorFlow and provides a web interface for testing the model.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.description: I'm always open to discussing new opportunities, collaborating on interesting projects, or just having a chat about technology. Feel free to reach out!
contact.availability: Available for internships and part-time opportunities
